msContents.summary: Unrelated fragments(5) (B) table with red ink grid

(?), no margins, (B) 4 lines, (4) 73 x 42, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 59 x 21, (A) 8 lines, top margin, (B) table, 4 lines, (6) 52 x 18, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) 9 lines, no margins, (7) 36 x 36, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 44 x 14, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (9) 30 x 19, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (10) 72 x 26, (A) 6 lines, bottom margins, (B) blank, (11) 78 x 30, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) 6 lines, top margin, (12) 92 x 20, (A) 10 lines, left margin, (B) 15 lines, no margins, (13) 78 x 25, (A) 10 lines + 1 line along left margin, top left margins, (B) 9 lines, no margins, (14) 132 x 27, (A) 9 lines, no margins (?), (B) traces

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
